original_text: I know everything that they do and everything that they think. So I will come. I will bring together the people from all nations and those who speak all languages. I will show them how great I am. I know everything that they do and everything that they think. So I will come. I will bring together the people from all nations and those who speak all languages. I will show them how great I am. I know everything that they do and everything that they think. So I will come. I will bring together the people from all nations and those who speak all languages. I will show them how great I am.
korean_text: 내가 그들의 행위와 사상을 아노라 때가 이르면 뭇 나라와 언어가 다른 민족들을 모으리니 그들이 와서 나의 영광을 볼 것이며

sentences.original_text: I know everything that they do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 하는 모든 것을 안다
그리고 그들이 생각하는 모든 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: I will bring together the people from all nations
and those who speak all languages
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 언어를 말하는 사람들을 모으겠다

sentences.original_text: I will show them how great I am
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 내가 얼마나 위대한지 보여주겠다

sentences.original_text: I know everything that they do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 하는 모든 것을 안다
